item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The show we're going to see is at 2:15 this coming Saturday. We'll meet outside between 1:45 and 2:00 and try to head in around 2 so we can sit together. Please RSVP if you haven't already!


OLD STUFF:
Part 2 in The Chronicles of Narnia series, Prince Caspian, promises lots of fantasy wonderment.

If you haven't seen the first movie in the series (or don't know the story), read up on The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe.

I picked a Saturday afternoon about a week after opening night for this movie because I was trying to get away from the crowd pinnacle that is opening weekend. I'll choose a time around 2 p.m. when the showtimes for 5/24 come out.

Feel free to bring your kids, neighbors, friends, neighbors' kids, etc. Just include them in your RSVP so I know how many people to expect. I may be bringing a few people myself (maybe the hubby and the stepkids).

If you think that another time/date would work better for the vast majority of people interested in this movie, please include a suggestion in your RSVP. I'm trying to arrange these blockbuster outings so the most people can come, so input is much appreciated!

Hope to see you at this movie!

--Dana
item.how_to_find_us: I'll fill this bit in later... I may be outside, I may be inside. It depends on whether or not I have a multi-ticket discount card (take the poll to find out more about how you can save money on each of our outings).
item.why: Because we have fun! We can go out afterwards to talk about the movie.
item.name: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian
